Package polyglot.util

Class Position

java.lang.Object
polyglot.util.Position
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.io.Serializable
public class Position
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable
This class represents a position within a source file. It is used to record where each AST node is located in a source file; this is used, for example, for generating error messages.
See Also:
Serialized Form

  • Method Details

    • compilerGenerated

      public static Position compilerGenerated​(int depth)
      Get a compiler generated position using the caller at the given stack depth. Depth 1 is the caller. Depth 2 is the caller's caller, etc.

    • compilerGenerated

      public static Position compilerGenerated()
      Get a compiler generated position.

      toString in class java.lang.Object

    • first

      public static Position first​(Position pos1, Position pos2)
      Returns the first of the given 2 positions i.e. if pos1 starts before pos2, then first(pos1, pos2) = pos1. Returns null if the given 2 positions are not comparable.

    • last

      public static Position last​(Position pos1, Position pos2)
      Returns the last of the given 2 positions i.e. if pos1 ends after pos2, then last(pos1, pos2) = pos1. Returns null if the given 2 positions are not comparable.
